snippet: The charges prosecutors on Monday filed against the treasurer of the ruling Workers Party, João Vaccari, and 26 others including a former high-ranking Petrobras executive, moved the payoff scandal closer to President Dilma Rousseff.
abstract: Bribery scandal involving Brazilian national oil company Petrobas closes in on Pres Dilma Rousseff as prosecutors file charges against Joao Vaccari, treasurer of ruling Workers Party.
lead_paragraph: The charges prosecutors on Monday filed against the treasurer of the ruling Workers Party, João Vaccari, and 26 others including a former high-ranking Petrobras executive, moved the payoff scandal closer to President Dilma Rousseff.

headline.main: Brazil Official Charged in Petrobras Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Brazil Official Charged in Bribery Case
